name: svps

scripts.patch: npx ncu -u; npm i; npm audit fix; npm version patch --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.minor: npx ncu -u; npm i; npm audit fix; npm version minor --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.major: npx ncu -u; npm i; npm audit fix; npm version major --no-git-tag-version;

author: https://github.com/wellwelwel
description: ðŸš€ A simple CLI tool to automating Ubuntu VPS set up
